tr.td: Creates a netbeans module jar. Includes the additional netbeans manifest entries defined in the file denoted by the maven.nbm.manifest property. Some netbeans manifest attributes are also defined by default. OpenIDE-Module-Implementation-Version, OpenIDE-Module, OpenIDE-Module-Specification-Version These are fallback values if they are not defined in manifest file.

Creates the nbm file. Will include the module jar, and also it's dependencies if they are marked in this manner:
true
